name: prowess-serverless
description: Prowess Valorant Stat tracking SLOBS app

scripts.create-dynamodb-tables: aws dynamodb create-table --region localhost --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --table-name 'sessions-table-dev' --attribute-definitions AttributeName=sessionId,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=sessionId,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 && aws dynamodb create-table --region localhost --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --table-name 'puuid-table-dev' --attribute-definitions AttributeName=playerIdentity,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=playerIdentity,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1
